sys_script.name: SLX NPS Encuesta proyecto

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_727519021b9254188802dac2cd4bcb91
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>false</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_hocsa_san_encuesta_de_proyecto</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="x_hocsa_san_encuesta_de_proyecto">u_slx_q9VALCHANGES^EQ<item display_value="-- None --" endquery="false" field="u_slx_q9" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>SLX NPS Encuesta proyecto</name><order>1910</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	var suma=0;
	var prom=0;
	var cont=0;
	var gr= new GlideRecord('x_hocsa_san_encuesta_de_proyecto'); 
	gr.addQuery('u_slx_cliente_firma_encuesta',current.u_slx_cliente_firma_encuesta );
	gr.query();
	//var q9= gr.u_slx_q9;
	
	while (gr.next()) {
		gs.addInfoMessage('entro a next');
		gs.addInfoMessage('q9: '+gr.u_slx_q9);
		suma += Number(gr.u_slx_q9);
		cont++;
		
		gs.addInfoMessage('cont: ' + cont);
		gs.addInfoMessage('suma: ' + suma);
	
		
		
            
	}
	prom = Math.round(suma / cont);
		gs.addInfoMessage('prom' + prom);
		current.u_slx_nps = prom;
		current.update();

	
	
// 	gr.update();

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>slx.bs</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-07-30 15:04:52</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>727519021b9254188802dac2cd4bcb91</sys_id><sys_mod_count>20</sys_mod_count><sys_name>SLX NPS Encuesta proyecto</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="san" source="x_hocsa_san">b3538a711ba598108802dac2cd4bcb8e</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="san">b3538a711ba598108802dac2cd4bcb8e</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_727519021b9254188802dac2cd4bcb91</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>slx.bs</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-07-30 16:20:11</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=727519021b9254188802dac2cd4bcb91"/></record_update>
